articles.title: Trump says ‘with a high degree of certainty’ that suspect in Charlie Kirk killing has been caught
articles.description:
Trump said a minister who is also involved with law enforcement turned in the suspect to authorities.

The post Trump says ‘with a high degree of certainty’ that suspect in Charlie Kirk killing has been caught appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Trump confirms suspect in Charlie Kirk's killing has been apprehended.
A minister involved with law enforcement reportedly turned in the suspect.
This development may ease community concerns over safety in Boston.

articles.title: Home of the Week: Start with a condo in the best of Boston
articles.description:
This 1-bedroom, 1-bath home has spectacular views of the Common and the State House.

The post Home of the Week: Start with a condo in the best of Boston appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Explore a 1-bedroom, 1-bath condo with views of Boston Common and State House.
Condo located in a prime area, enhancing property value for local residents.
Ideal for first-time buyers seeking a vibrant Boston lifestyle and scenic surroundings.

articles.title: Your new Cape house could be a 245-square-foot cottage in Eastham for $259,000
articles.description:
What it lacks in square footage, it makes up for in character.

The post Your new Cape house could be a 245-square-foot cottage in Eastham for $259,000 appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Eastham offers a 245-square-foot cottage for $259,000, appealing to Boston homebuyers.
The cottage emphasizes character despite its small size, attracting interest from potential buyers.
This affordable option could provide a getaway for Boston residents seeking Cape Cod properties.
